name: Finance Tracker 4.0
description: Take Control of Your Money with the All-New Finance Tracker 4.0Ready to stop guessing where your money is going and finally get a clear, accurate view of your finances?The Finance Tracker 4.0 is the most advanced version ever, rebuilt to make money management simple, intuitive, and fully automated inside Notion.Whether you're budgeting for the first time or juggling multiple accounts, this template gives you the clarity and structure you need to make smarter financial decisions.ðŸš© Why Choose the
features: A complete financial system split into 5 powerful dashboardsMain Dashboard, Transactions, Net Worth, Monthly Dashboard, and Bills Tracker â€” all synced automatically.; Full transaction automationTrack expenses, income, assets, liabilities, and accounts without touching a spreadsheet.; Real-time updates based on the current monthMonthly summaries, savings charts, net worth, and reports refresh instantly.; Zero clutter, zero duplicate databasesAll data flows smoothly between dashboards without maintenance.; Smart budgeting toolsSet monthly spending goals and income targets with live progress tracking.
